players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to be careful and analyze everyone's words. No one is above suspicion."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "I trust my investigation. Alice is mafioso. Vote Alice to win."
Bob: "I vote Alice. Diana's investigation seems credible and we have no counter-claim."
